sys_ux_client_script.name: showOnloadAlerts

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_77c4af371b858d10b81fdce7cc4bcb84
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script">
    <sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <includes/>
        <macroponent display_value="Record">57c4eb371b858d10b81fdce7cc4bcb6d</macroponent>
        <name>showOnloadAlerts</name>
        <required_translations>[ ]</required_translations>
        <script><![CDATA[function handler({api,event,imports}) {
  var paramsString = api.context.props.extraParams,
    paramsObj = paramsString?.split('/'),
    alerts;

  if (!paramsObj || !paramsObj.length || (paramsObj.indexOf('alerts') < 0)) return;

  alerts = paramsObj[paramsObj.indexOf('alerts') + 1];
  try {
    alerts = JSON.parse(alerts);
  } catch(e) {}

  if (!alerts)
    return;
  if (typeof alerts == 'string') {
    alerts = [{
      id: "record-alert-1",
      status: "info",
      icon: "info-circle-outline",
      content: alerts,
      action: {
        type: "dismiss"
      }
    }];
  }
  api.emit('NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS', {
    items: alerts
  });
}]]></script>
        <script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version>
        <sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-01-21 21:02:45</sys_created_on>
